name: exphunter
title: Illumina Expansion Hunter
summary: Genotype STRs for copy number in WGS aligned sequence reads (BAM, CRAM) using Expansion Hunter method

inputSpec.name: readfile
inputSpec.label: (BAM or CRAM) aligned sequence reads in which STRs to be genotyped for copy number

inputSpec.name: buildfile
inputSpec.label: (FASTA) genome reference build to which reads are aligned

inputSpec.name: varcatalog
inputSpec.label: (JSON) Defined STR metadata for which genotyping should be attempted

inputSpec.name: outprefix
inputSpec.label: (STR) prefix to be used in naming of output files

inputSpec.name: mode
inputSpec.label: (STR) Expansion Hunter analysis mode
inputSpec.help: reads must be sorted if using seeking analysis mode, therefore default is streaming which requires no preprocessing

outputSpec.name: outvcf
outputSpec.label: (VCF) STR copy number genotypes and metadata; equivalent to JSON

outputSpec.name: outjson
outputSpec.label: (JSON) STR copy number genotypes and metadata; equivalent to VCF but easier to parse programatically
